privacy.title: The information we collect
privacy.text: When you sign up with our billing provider, we are given your email address, subscriptionID and transactionsID. Please see our authorized merchant's Privacy Policy concerning collected information from them. When you fill out a trouble report form, we ask you to submit information about your computer, connection and software. To notice applies to all information collected or submitted on the Beta.TrentonDucati.com website.

privacy.title: The way we use information
privacy.text: We use the information that we get from our billing provider to verify that you have purchased a membership. Additionally, we use your email address to give you access to Beta.TrentonDucati.com and its services. Any information submitted to us on our trouble report form is only used to help us diagnose your specific problem(s).

privacy.title: Our commitment to data security
privacy.text: To prevent unauthorized access, maintain data accuracy, and ensure the correct use of information, we have put in place appropriate physical, electronic, and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

privacy.title: How you can access or correct your information
privacy.text: You can access all your personally identifiable information that we collect online and maintain by emailing support@adultpaysitesupport.com. Please include your user name and password and use "Please Send Personal Information" in the subject line of your email. We use this procedure to better safeguard your information. You can correct factual errors in your personally identifiable information by sending us a request that credibily shows error. To protect your privacy and security, we will also take reasonable steps to verify your identity before granting access or make corrections.
